About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: We help citizens learn democracy and vote with confidence.
About.mission: My First Ballot is an interactive digital simulation platform designed to empower citizens to 'practice' democracy in a safe, risk-free environment. Developed as a core component of the 'Artivism for Democracy' initiative by Kashful Foundation under the Digital Democracy Initiative, this quiz-centric game places players in realistic democratic scenarios. It challenges users to navigate the complexities of the electoral process, identify digital threats, and uphold civic accountability, transforming abstract legal concepts into an engaging, hands-on learning experience.
About.purpose1: To provide a risk-free digital environment where citizens can practice democratic decision-making and experience its consequences.
About.purpose2: To strengthen digital literacy by training users to identify misinformation and digital safety threats through interactive challenges.
About.purpose3: To gamify complex constitutional frameworks into accessible, quiz-based scenarios that test and expand civic knowledge.
About.purpose4: To help citizens internalize the concepts of accountability and civic duty through active, scenario-based role-playing.
About.values1: It addresses the critical seventeen-year gap in civic practice by reintroducing the mechanics of voting to a new generation.
About.values2: It builds essential public resilience against the unchecked proliferation of digital misinformation and hate speech.
About.values3: It transforms passive civic education into active participation, fostering a deeper emotional connection to democratic rights.
About.values4: It equips citizens with the practical confidence needed to responsibly exercise their rights during this pivotal democratic transition.
